title: (x)Modernized Toys Corp - Franklin Gothic, Comic Sans, Freestyle Script {Chesh, Nathan, Mark S}
content:
![modernized](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410012728im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23966.jpg)

 [‹ (x) font for birth-card - Amazone {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410012728/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2692 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Banana Republic Typeface - TF Arrow {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410012728/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2662 "Go to next forum topic")
author: silly

comments.content: Looks like Franklin Gothic No. 2 obliqued, Comic Sans, and something else I know I've seen but can't recall at the moment.

Comic Sans paired with Freestyle Script... what a   
_dashing_ combination! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410012728im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
